page.title: 17TRANSPORT
page.content: There is a British Rail link to the main line at Liskeard via the beautiful Looe Valley,it is a journey of 8 miles with an unusual reversal at Coombe Junction.A private bus service of 10 journeys per day is run between the Sunrising area of Looe to Polperro via Hannafore and Trelawne.Western National provide a three daily service to Plymouth,also a private service is supplied to Plymouth on certain days in the week.During the summer months daily excursions are made to other beauty spots and holiday resorts.A small passenger ferry service is run during the summer months over Looe river and to Looe Island (St.Georges Island ).
